alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alachua County through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over central Alachua County, moving slowly west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, University Of Florida and Gainesville Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
